markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Karumzek Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1655)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Groups of tiny karumzeks can form a dangerous swarm.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Karumzek Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1655)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 81</row>

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), poison sense (precise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +23, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Poison Sense** A karumzek senses any [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) creature. It can spend an action with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait to determine the poison's type and current stage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +24 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 175

**Immunities**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 10, slashing 10

**Weaknesses**
area damage 10, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 10, good 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 30 feet

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 30
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; swarm only)
- **6th**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) (×3), [Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=726)

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the karumzek swarm's space takes 2d6 piercing damage (DC 27 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) plus karumzek venom.

**Karumzek Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [Virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162)) **Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 poison and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 5d6 poison, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and enfeebled 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison, clumsy 2, and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-290" />
name: Karumzek Swarm
